Articles.Content:
Hi there!

So I have this problem with all of my vessels with a scansat probe installed.

Basically even if they are at the optimal orbit, they will scan the planet's map, but they won't show any resources whatsoever.

I've also installed MKS and Khetane, is it possible that those mods are creating some sort of conflincts?

Edited February 24, 2018 by pippoceto
